runs.comm: that is some start from Dwayne Smith, he's carted McCullum over the long-off boundary. Stand and deliver stuff.
pushed from the crease towards the off side
flat and straight from McCullum, Smith plays it back to the bowler
over long-on this time. Smith leans forward, gets under the ball and lofts with power. Clean strike through the line
better length this time and Smith pushes towards mid-off
defended on the back foot towards the off side
good length angling across the left-hander, Gayle stays in his crease and lets it go
fuller ball slanting across off stump, Gayle lets it go again
short of a length and that delivery rises on Gayle, who stays in his crease, gets behind the line and blocks
wider outside off stump, Gayle lets it go again
a sharp short ball from Bracewell, Gayle swayed his head out of the way and let it pass
Gayle short-arm pulls a short delivery in front of square, he didn't try and hit it with power and played it along the ground
short of a length outside off, Smith stays in his crease and square drives fluently to Brownlie at cover point
fuller length outside off and Smith biffs it hard off the front foot, forcing the fielder at mid off to hurry to his left and field
good length and straight, Gayle defends, but Southee's overstepped according to the umpire. Replays show his foot landed just behind the line. Free-hit coming up.
Gayle clears his front foot and slogs, he inside edges it into the ground and the keeper dives to his right to collect
too short and Gayle has pulled with power through midwicket
defended from the crease on the off side, much better length from Southee
Gayle stays in his crease and knocks the ball towards cover point
Smith tries to pull a ball that isn't short enough from outside off stump and gets an inside edge on to the thigh
the slower ball on a good length around off stump, Smith defends towards cover
that has vanished. The ball was short and wide outside off stump. Smith did not hold back, freeing his arms and carving the ball over point
a bit too straight this time but Smith fails to connect with the flick, gets a leg bye towards square leg
another bouncer at Gayle, who sways out of the way. That's too high, though, well over Gayle's head
played off the back foot towards midwicket, Gayle runs a quick single
bowled him! The length was far too good to be swinging across the line. Smith aimed for midwicket but missed the ball angling into him from outside off. Off stump took a beating.
full on the pads and tucked away behind square leg
goes back and punches his first ball on off stump into the covers but can't pierce the in-field
half-volley outside off and punched with good timing but picks out mid-off and can't get underway
this is a good length ball from Southee around off stump and Charles doesn't get much timing as he punches to point
this is shorter than the previous delivery and Charles plays a short-arm pull off the front foot and smears it across the line and over the in-fielders at midwicket to the boundary

Gayle almost gone there, Charles completely mistimed the drive as he tried to knife through the line on the up, goes on the bounce to mid-off, Gayle had started for a run and was miles out had the throw hit
the first ball is full down leg, Gayle misses out but it must have hit his pad on the way through as the umpire does not signal a wide
this is a horrible attempted slower ball, miles down leg and Gayle can't get to it, wide given
oh dear, Oram is bowling a good line to a right-hander but this is poor to Gayle, he has to leave one down the leg side, that's how wide it was
this is full on middle and Gayle defends with soft hands into the covers and strolls through for a single in typically laidback Gayle fashion
short and wide outside off, Charles frees his arms and slashes it over backward point and down to the fence
ball is full outside off and Charles hits in the air for a fraction of a second as the drive goes to cover after several bounces
slower ball from Oram outside off and Charles pushes into the covers but can't sneak a single

Charles again tries to go over the top on the off-side, doesn't time it all that well but he manages to get enough on it over the in-field and down to the boundary, which is given after several replays to check whether the fielder had dragged it back. He hadn't
this is full and flat on leg and turned behind square and they jog a single
Gayle tamely pushes a full ball on middle and leg back to the bowler
this is full outside off, Gayle stays in the crease and looks to cut but it isn't short enough and he mistimes to short cover
worked away into the leg side from a middle-and-leg line
fired in on leg and flicked straight to short midwicket
on middle and leg and pushed down the ground to long-off
steps down the track a touch and plays a good length ball on middle and off down to long-off
Gayle nearly holes out, on leg and he whips it away out into the leg side, deep midwicket running in puts a big dive in but can't quite get to it
this is short but flat on leg, Charles misses the flick, hits the pad and rolls fine
goes back and punches into the off-side

this is a full toss outside off, Charles goes for a big swing and somehow manages to slice it with enough control to get it over the head of cover running back, Gayle has to really hurry back for the second
beaten outside off as he tries to cut
chips down the track and flicks it to long-on
Gayle using his feet now, but can only tap it to the bowler's left and down to long-on

a boundary for Gayle after a while, full outside off and smeared to the left of Oram at long-off who runs round and puts a dive in but can only deflect it over the rope, Oram might be in trouble here, his knee took out a massive chunk of the turf and he is getting up gingerly, he is moving very slowly but is still on for now
Gayle plays a late cut but picks out backward point
full outside off and drives to long-off
Charles backs away and exposes the timber, Hira follows him and he slogs to long-on
Gayle goes back and pulls but picks out midwicket
fired flat and fast down leg, Latham can't collect cleanly and they take a run to add to the wide
reverse sweep off the back of the bat, it was full outside off and he gets it away behind point and they rush back for Gayle to have strike for the next over
Gayle goes after this ball, half-volley outside off, Gayle gives himself some room and smacks it flat down the ground
back-to-back boundaries for Gayle as most feedbackers wanted, comes down the track and lofts it one-bounce over the bowler's head
full on leg and Gayle tucks it calmly towards long-on
oh dear, missed stumping by Latham and to add insult to injury, he tries to run him out but instead gifts an overthrow, Charles had come down and missed a slog by a mile
Charles mistimes it back to the right of the bowler - Nathan McCullum dives and stops it
that is the Gayle all of you wanted to see. Plants his front foot down the pitch and swings a full ball on leg in high and mighty fashion into the hospitality tents at midwicket

oh my, Gayle has absolutely bludgeoned this tossed-up ball outside off back at Hira, it has slammed into his finger (technically and harshly speaking a dropped chance) and still rushes to long-on, Hira is going off immediately, he may have fractured a finger
that is another dropped chance, wide outside off, came down and edged the carve over covers, Latham misses it and it rolls towards third man
wide, very wide down leg
Charles dabs a full ball outside off behind point with delicate hands
appeal for lbw first up but it pitched outside leg before it turned past Gayle's flick and hit the pad  in line with leg stump, rolls to off
Charles goes back, keeps a bit low but he still punches past a diving cover on the edge of the circle

there goes Gayle again! Rocks back as he sees the short ball sit up and it sails into the stands with brute power behind it, Gayle is warming up here nicely, the West Indies could add much more to the current projected total
goes back and punches through cover point into the deep
short and flat on middle and leg, Charles works it to fine leg on the circle
way down leg, Gayle misses the pull, appeal for caught behind is turned down and the wide is given to Nicol's annoyance
plays it back to Nicol down the pitch

West Indies fans, send your complaints to Riddymon and not to me! Charles goes for an absolutely filthy slog to leg, it was full on off but Charles had made his mind up and it skews off the outer edge high in the air where backward point settles under it
Gayle plays it without his usual power down to long-off
well Pollard's strike rate is currently 600, it is in the slot outside off and Pollard just smokes it with a short backlift over the cow corner boundary
slices this through the off side and comes back for a second
Pollard is giving the West Indies real impetus, this is again full outside off, this time Pollard shows he can hit them big on the off-side and smacks it over the despairing long-off's head
full on leg from around the wicket and slammed on the bounce to long-on
terrible short ball down leg, tried to fire it full and flat but instead sends it very wide down leg
smeared across the line into the deep
this is down leg and beats Gayle's flick, he almost overbalances but recovers and the wide is given
absolutely clobbered by Pollard who is making exactly the impact expected, in the slot outside off and slammed over long-off with ease
full on the stumps and punched straight back to Nicol
this is full on leg and he smacks it away out to deep midwicket fence
good length outside off and smeared to cow corner where deep midwicket runs around well to cut it off
Gayle flicks it off the pads towards deep square leg and brings up his half-century
this is a similar delivery and stroke to that played by Pollard earlier in the over - the difference here is that this time Pollard has enough power to bisect the fielders in the deep
full outside off and Pollard stylishly carves it through cover point and deep cover running around dives in vain
full on middle in the slot and Gayle is merciless, opens the front leg and blasts it to the cow corner boundary

almost bowls him with a yorker, gets him in a tangle as he tries to get his pads out of the way, but it's a no-ball and a free hit as the delivery goes wasted. Although for the second time in the match, a no-ball is called when the foot was actually behind the line
this is pushed through well down leg, Oram is not having the best of days so far
fires that yorker in again, Gayle gets his pads out of the way and even gets some bat on it as he squeezes it between his legs and past the diving Latham to the fine leg fence
another no-ball as Gayle opens up and drills a full ball on leg to long-on, this time the correct call is made and another free hit results
misses out though, slower ball outside off and Pollard tries a bizarre reverse scoop over third man and doesn't come close to making contact

oh dear, dropped by Taylor at deep fine leg, he had run round to try and collect a top-edged pull and looked to have it covered but ended up trying to take it while falling and he grasses it, to make matters worse for New Zealand he rolls around on his shoulder in pain and is very slow to get up, is still holding it with concern
Pollard greets him with utter disdain and picks a full ball up and deposits it over the wide long-on boundary
slower ball on leg is mistimed back to Southee for some temporary respite from the onslaught
slammed powerfully to cover, had that gone either side of the fielder it was four
moves across outside off and tries to paddle sweep, unnecessary considering the damage he's inflicted so far with conventional strokes, misses and is hit on the pads
a back of the hand slower ball is dragged short, Pollard is waiting back in the crease for it but totally mistimes the smear into the leg side
very full on leg and clipped away behind square to the left of the fielder in the deep, two overs to go and West Indies will want 190-200
beaten outside off by a ball in the blockhole, well bowled
this is short, this is wide and Pollard takes it on with glee and smokes it over long-on to bring up a half-century with a scoring rate of more than two runs every ball
smacks a full ball with great timing but long-on can run to their right and just collect it in front of the rope
horrendous ball to bowl at the death stage, again miles down leg, New Zealand have bowled so many similar wides today

another drop by New Zealand although this was very tough, Gayle opened up and slammed a full ball flat towards long-on where Nathan McCullum dived to his right while aerial, but it goes straight through his hands and over the rope
long hop on middle and leg and Gayle doesn't need an invitation, gets both the elevation and the distance and New Zealand are collapsing completely here, can Gayle get an improbable hundred??
half-volley outside off and Gayle is putting New Zealand through the spin cycle in the washing machine, clears that front leg in typical fashion and creams it over the rope at cow corner
full on leg and uppishly flicked off the pads by Pollard with such excellent timing that it pinpoints the gap between the two fielders in the deep
hopeless full toss and Pollard swings with all his might from deep in the crease, sends it along the ground to the square leg fence to bring up the 100 partnership from only 39 balls!
sliced into the deep on the off side
terrible line from Southee, well down leg and Gayle manages to get to it and flick it fine for an easy boundary
drilled to long-off for just the single, but West Indies don't need any more than that
in the blockhole outside off and guided to third man, the West Indies end on their highest ever Twenty20 International score after pillaging 78 runs in the last five overs
